column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute of Chicago is a world-class museum.  It is an institution and major landmark not only for Chicago
column2: but for the United States as a whole.  Chicago natives can be proud of many things
column3: and this is among the very best the city has to offer.  Unlike NYC or LA
column4: where great art is spread across various museums and collections
column5: the Art Institute of Chicago offers all of the city's great art in one stop
column7: near Millennium and Grant Park.  This is a very special place.
